content: crochet sunflower earring designed by akeish fearon © elemental knots - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you can sell the finished products with your own photos but if you do so please give pattern credit to elemental knots thank you and enjoy about us i ve always been fascinated with the how the why and the what if you re familiar with chemistry then you d realize that i was destined for a career in chemistry i always knew i was going to end up doing something in the science field but never did i foresee myself doing crochet moreover becoming a crochet designer but hey life is full of surprises a few years later and here i am designing my own patterns elements are substances that cannot be broken down any further but some of them are crucial for our survival while others help us to create innovative ideas to enhance our way of life and this is the basis of elemental knots i aim to add a little element to your life by using both crochet and macrame ps i stumbled upon macrame while learning crochet creating art with strings is simply amazing © elemental knots - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you can sell the finished products with your own photos but if you do so please give pattern credit to elemental knots thank you and enjoy terms and condition this pattern is an original pattern created by elemental knots therefore this pattern or the photos in it should not be copied redistributed or sold however the products created from this pattern can be sold but on one condition the condition is to always give credit to the elemental knots as the original designer also feel free to tag me on social media platforms @elementalknots tik tok instagram and twitter or use the hashtags #elementalknots and #elementalknotssunflower i hope you enjoy this pattern as much as i did creating it and i can t wait to see your products if you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out to me through email at elementalknots@gmail com or direct message on any of the above mentioned social media platforms happy crocheting ♥ © elemental knots -
